text: In Walked Mary is a 1920 American silent drama film directed by George Archainbaud and starring June Caprice, Thomas Carrigan and Stanley Walpole.Leteux p.182 ==Cast== * June Caprice as Mary Ann Hubbard * Thomas Carrigan as Dick Allison * Stanley Walpole as Wilbur Darcey * Vivienne Osborne as Betsy Caldwell * Frances Miller as Mammy ==Preservation status== *The film is preserved in the Library of Congress. ==References== ==Bibliography== * Christine Leteux. Albert Capellani: Pioneer of the Silent Screen. University Press of Kentucky, 2015. ==External links== * Category:1920 films Category:1920 drama films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by George Archainbaud Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Pathé Exchange films Category:American black-and-white films
title: In Walked Mary
